casebody.data:
No. 09-1403. Erica P. John Fund, Inc., fka Archdiocese of Milwaukee Supporting Fund, Inc., Petitioner v. Halliburton Co., et al. 562 U.S. 1127, 131 S. Ct. 856,

178 L. Ed. 2d 622,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 9. January 7, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit granted.

Same case below, 597 F.3d 330.
